notes.name: Enchanted Cave
notes.description: The cave is said to house a secret power guarded by ancient spirits. Approach with respect and the path shall open.

notes.name: Mystic Forest Map
notes.description: The map reveals hidden pathways through the Mystic Forest. Some paths lead to treasures, others to peril.

notes.name: Ancient Ruins
notes.description: Beware the ruins at the mountain peak. Legends speak of a slumbering beast with eyes like coal and a roar that shakes the earth.

notes.name: Herbalist's Recipe
notes.description: For a potion of healing, mix two parts Redleaf with one part Moonflower under the light of a full moon.

notes.name: Thief's Confession
notes.description: Hidden in the depths of the Thieves' Guild lies a gemstone, the Heart of the Ocean. Its curse I've borne; now it seeks a new keeper.
